welcome_message_body: Welcome to Iguacu, Brazil! Get ready to be captivated by the breathtaking Iguazu Falls and the city's vibrant culture. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galeao Antonio Carlos Jobim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Galeao Antonio Carlos Jobim Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Galeao Antonio Carlos Jobim Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
